alert.note: Alert for Hunterdon; Morris; Sussex; Warren (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 14 at 10:00AM EST until January 14 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts of 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of northern and northwest New Jersey and east central, northeast and southeast Pennsylvania. * WHEN...Until 5 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An abrupt wind shift and wind speed is expected late this morning and may be accompanied by snow showers. Strong winds will persist into early this evening.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
